Adjective: sustained or maintained by aid (as distinct from physical suppor)
held up or having the weight borne especially from below
Verb: give moral or psychological support, aid, or courage to
be the physical support of; carry the weight of
establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts
support with evidence or authority or make more certain or confirm
argue or speak in defense of
play a subordinate role to (another performe)
be a regular customer or client of
put up with something or somebody unpleasant
